summary: Underneath the sands of Egypt, Anubis, an ancient evil spirit, has awakened. It's up to Yugi, who defeated Anubis centuries ago, to use his skill and determination to rid the world of evil once again.
cast: Gregory Abbey|Sebastian Arcelus|Ben Baron|Amy Birnbaum|Madeleine Blaustein|Christopher Collet|Darren Dunstan|Wayne Grayson|Dan Green|Kôji Ishii|Shunsuke Kazama|Hidehiro Kikuchi|Ted Lewis|Tadashi Miyazawa|Lisa Ortiz|Mike Pollock|Scott Rayow|Maki Saitou|Tara Sands|Eric Stuart|Hiroki Takahashi|Jirou Jay Takasugi|Junko Takeuchi|Marc Thompson|Kenjirô Tsuda
keywords: nightmare|based on television series|laughter|good versus evil|saving the world
title: ¡Yu-Gi-Oh!: La película
